title: ICMAI CoP Holders Get CPE Deadline Extension Till March 31, 2026!
content:
# ICMAI CoP Holders Get CPE Deadline Extension Till March 31, 2026!

Ek important update hai for all our fellow Cost Accountants! The Institute of Cost Accountants of India (ICMAI) ne apne members holding a Certificate of Practice (CoP) ke liye mandatory Continuing Professional Education (CPE) requirements ko complete karne ki deadline extend kar di hai.

The Council of ICMAI has observed that many practicing members had not met the mandatory CPE hours requirement. To ensure smooth continuity of practice, a further extension has been granted.

*   **Original Due Date:** The initial requirement for CPE credit hours for the year 2024-25 was March 31, 2025. Previous extensions were granted up to June 30, 2025, and then up to September 30, 2025.
*   **New Due Date:** Members now have until **March 31, 2026**, to clear any shortfall in CPE Credit Hours pertaining to the year 2024-25, along with fulfilling the CPE Credit Hours requirement for the current year, i.e., 2025-26.
*   **Notification Details:** This extension was announced via Notice Ref. No. G/128/09/2025, dated September 30, 2025.

Members are strongly advised to take advantage of this extended window to ensure full compliance, as any further non-compliance may lead to the discontinuation of their Certificate of Practice.
